p: Fatalities according to time of year rank, July as having the highest percentage of deaths caused by hornets, wasps, and bees, accounting for 32.0% of the total ( Figure 3). Followed by August, October, and September, with a 17.9, 14.1, and 10.2% of the total deaths, respectively. No deaths occurred from 1999 to 2018 in Spain in the months of January and March.
